title: Celo Terms of Use and FAQ
metaDescription: Celo Terms, Privacy Policy & Frequently Asked Questions
privacyNote: The Celo Network stores phone number hashes to allow for payments to a phone number. By verifying your phone number, you consent to having your hashed phone number stored on the Celo Blockchain.
gameOfStakesTermsMetaDescription: Legal Terms and Conditions of The Great Celo Stake Off
